original_text: He must have all the inside walls of the house scraped and the material that is scraped off dumped into an unclean place outside the town.
korean_text: 또 집 안 사방을 긁게 하고 그 긁은 흙을 성 밖 부정한 곳에 쏟아버리게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: He must have all the inside walls of the house scraped
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 집의 모든 내부 벽을 긁어내게 해야 한다

sentences.original_text: and the material that is scraped off
